page.title: 15Farming-Dairying-Shadowside
page.content: Shadowside farm is one half of a unit ,the other half being Little Hillbrae farm which is situated approximately one mile to the south east. This unit is a mixed dairy farm; that is the main enterprise is dairying from a commercial herd but they also grow barley as a main crop. Shadowside has been in the family for five generations, the present owner Mr Cooper taking over from his grandmother two years ago. His father Mr Cooper Sen. farms at Little Hillbrae but it is a joint enterprise. The total land area is 276 acres of which 22 acres is rough pasture land and this year 100 acres is in barley which when mature will be sold for cattle feed. 54 cows are milked twice daily, milk sent to Aberdeen Milk Marketing Board.
